item.title: Coming Soon to CPA - Package Pinning
item.description: Welcome back to this blog series on Crunchy Postgres via Automation (CPA).

item.title: Anatomy of a Collection; Dissecting CPA
item.description: Prior posts in this series have discussed the Crunchy Postgres via Automation product, the team behind it, and some of our processes and tooling.

item.title: On CVEs, BoMs, and Releases
item.description: As previously mentioned in this Crunchy Postgres via Automation series, we now use a Bill of Materials (BoM) to ship tested-together versions of the components that comprise the CPA product.

item.title: Crunchy Postgres via Automation V2.2
item.description: Continuing our series on Crunchy Postgres via Automation, we’re here this week to discuss the highlights of our latest release line, v2.

item.title: Automating Highly Available PostgreSQL Clusters
item.description: In March of ‘23, I took over as the Lead Architect of my employer’s Ansible-based automation for creating highly-available PostgreSQL clusters.
